languages.text: "Лично я, Звездное Сиятельство, не отгадал бы... даже, скажем так, антиотгадал бы любого из них. В шелках и рюшах и замарашка кажется принцессой! Но вы видите людей насквозь! Мейв, вручи же наш особый дар звездно{mf|му|й} гост{mf|ю|ье}!"
languages.translation_comment: FW_FakeGovernor Анимация "Лидзи подходит и дарит подарок" В конце куя FW_Prize_HideAndSeekSmall_item ЕСЛИ ПОТРАТИЛИ ХОТЯ БЫ ОДИН ЗАРЯД ИНФОПЕЧАТИ

traits.locale_text: "Лично я, Ваше Сиятельство, не отгадал бы... даже, скажем так, антиотгадал бы любого из них. В шелках и рюшах и замарашка кажется принцессой! Но вы видите людей насквозь! Лидзи, вручи же наш особый дар звездно{mf|му|й} гост{mf|ю|ье}!"

languages.translation_comment: FW_FakeGovernor Анимация "Лидзи подходит и дарит подарок" В конце куя FW_Prize_HideAndSeekSmall_item ЕСЛИ ПОТРАТИЛИ ХОТЯ БЫ ОДИН ЗАРЯД ИНФОПЕЧАТИ

languages.text: "Had it been me in your shoes, Your Celestial Highness, I would not have guessed any of them — I dare say I would have... anti-guessed! After all, even a scrubwoman would look like a princess if you dressed her in silks and laces. But you are able to see through any deception! Maive, go on and present our special gift to our celestial guest!"
languages.original_text: "Лично я, Звездное Сиятельство, не отгадал бы... даже, скажем так, антиотгадал бы любого из них. В шелках и рюшах и замарашка кажется принцессой! Но вы видите людей насквозь! Мейв, вручи же наш особый дар звездно{mf|му|й} гост{mf|ю|ье}!"

traits.locale_text: "Had it been me in your shoes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would not have guessed any of them — I dare say I would have... anti-guessed! After all, even a scrubwoman would look like a princess if you dressed her in silks and laces. But you can see through any deception! Lidzy, go on and present our special gift to our celestial guest!"

Maive, go on and present our special gift to our celestial guest!"

"Had it been me in your shoes, Your Celestial Highness, I would not have guessed any of them — I dare say I would have... anti-guessed! After all, even a scrubwoman would look like a princess if you dressed her in silks and laces. But you are able to see through any deception! Maive, go on and present our special gift to our celestial guest!"

languages.text: “如果换做是我，来自上界的大人，我恐怕连一个冒牌货都找不出来。甚至可以说，我会……错怪无数真正的贵族！毕竟，即便是洗衣女工，只要穿上了丝绸花边的长裙，看起来也会像真正的公主一样。不过，您却看穿了那些假象！去吧，梅芙，准备好我们特别的礼物，献给这些来自上界的贵客吧！”
languages.original_text: "Had it been me in your shoes, Your Celestial Highness, I would not have guessed any of them — I dare say I would have... anti-guessed! After all, even a scrubwoman would look like a princess if you dressed her in silks and laces. But you are able to see through any deception! Maive, go on and present our special gift to our celestial guest!"

traits.locale_text: “如果换做是我，来自上界的大人，我恐怕连一个冒牌货都找不出来。甚至可以说，我会……错怪无数真正的贵族！毕竟，即便是洗衣女工，只要穿上了丝绸花边的长裙，看起来也会像真正的公主一样。不过，您却看穿了那些假象！去吧，梅芙，准备好我们特别的礼物，献给这些来自上界的贵客吧！”

languages.text: «De haber estado en su pellejo, Excelencia Celestial, no habría escogido a ninguno de ellos; ¡me atrevería a afirmar más bien lo contrario! Después de todo, incluso una humilde fregona puede parecer una princesa si se viste con sedas y encajes. ¡Pero usted ha sido capaz de ver a través del engaño! ¡Maive, acércate y entrega nuestro obsequio especial a {mf|nuestro|nuestra} invitada celestial!».
languages.original_text: "Had it been me in your shoes, Your Celestial Highness, I would not have guessed any of them — I dare say I would have... anti-guessed! After all, even a scrubwoman would look like a princess if you dressed her in silks and laces. But you are able to see through any deception! Maive, go on and present our special gift to our celestial guest!"

traits.locale_text: «De haber estado en su pellejo, Excelencia Celestial, no habría escogido a ninguno de ellos; ¡me atrevería a afirmar más bien lo contrario! Después de todo, incluso una humilde fregona puede parecer una princesa si se viste con sedas y encajes. ¡Pero usted ha sido capaz de ver a través del engaño! ¡Maive, acércate y entrega nuestro obsequio especial a {mf|nuestro|nuestra} invitada celestial!».

languages.text: "Sizin yerinizde ben olsaydım Semavi Efendimiz, hiçbirini hayatta tahmin edemezdim. Hatta şöyle söyleyeyim... Doğru tahmin edemezdim! Ne de olsa bir hizmetçi kadını bile ipekler ve dantellerle giydirseniz göze prenses görünür. Ancak siz, her türlü aldatmacayı berrak bir şekilde görebiliyorsunuz! Maive, devam et. Özel armağanımızı semavi misafirimize sun!"
languages.original_text: "Had it been me in your shoes, Your Celestial Highness, I would not have guessed any of them — I dare say I would have... anti-guessed! After all, even a scrubwoman would look like a princess if you dressed her in silks and laces. But you are able to see through any deception! Maive, go on and present our special gift to our celestial guest!"

traits.locale_text: "Sizin yerinizde ben olsaydım Semavi Efendimiz, hiçbirini hayatta tahmin edemezdim. Hatta şöyle söyleyeyim... Doğru tahmin edemezdim! Ne de olsa bir hizmetçi kadını bile ipekler ve dantellerle giydirseniz göze prenses görünür. Ancak siz, her türlü aldatmacayı berrak bir şekilde görebiliyorsunuz! Maive, devam et. Özel armağanımızı semavi misafirimize sun!"

languages.text: 「天の閣下、もし私があなたの立場であったなら、誰も当てられなかったでしょう。私はあえて推測しなかったでしょう！結局、たとえ掃除婦でも、シルクとレースに身を包めばプリンセスのように見えるものです。しかし、あなたはあらゆる見せかけを見破ることができます。メイヴ、私たちの特別な賞品を天のお客人に差し上げろ！」
languages.original_text: "Had it been me in your shoes, Your Celestial Highness, I would not have guessed any of them — I dare say I would have... anti-guessed! After all, even a scrubwoman would look like a princess if you dressed her in silks and laces. But you are able to see through any deception! Maive, go on and present our special gift to our celestial guest!"

traits.locale_text: 「天の閣下、もし私があなたの立場であったなら、誰も当てられなかったでしょう。私はあえて推測しなかったでしょう！結局、たとえ掃除婦でも、シルクとレースに身を包めばプリンセスのように見えるものです。しかし、あなたはあらゆる見せかけを見破ることができます。メイヴ、私たちの特別な賞品を天のお客人に差し上げろ！」

languages.text: « À votre place, Votre Altesse Célestissime, je n'en aurais démasqué absolument aucun... Je dirais même plus : je les aurais... anti-démasqués ! Après tout, drapée dans de la dentelle, même une souillon passerait pour une princesse. Mais vous, rien ne peut vous tromper ! Maive, venez donc présenter notre cadeau spécial à notre céleste hôte ! »
languages.original_text: "Had it been me in your shoes, Your Celestial Highness, I would not have guessed any of them — I dare say I would have... anti-guessed! After all, even a scrubwoman would look like a princess if you dressed her in silks and laces. But you are able to see through any deception! Maive, go on and present our special gift to our celestial guest!"

traits.locale_text: « À votre place, Votre Altesse Célestissime, je n'en aurais démasqué absolument aucun... Je dirais même plus : je les aurais... anti-démasqués ! Après tout, drapée dans de la dentelle, même une souillon passerait pour une princesse. Mais vous, rien ne peut vous tromper ! Maive, venez donc présenter notre cadeau spécial à notre céleste hôte ! »

languages.text: "Wäre ich an Eurer Stelle gewesen, Eure himmlische Hoheit, ich hätte keinen einzigen von ihnen erraten. Beinahe möchte ich sagen, ich hätte ... anti-geraten! Schließlich sähe selbst eine Putzfrau wie eine Prinzessin aus, wenn man sie in Seide und Spitze kleidet. Ihr aber durchschaut jede Täuschung! Maive, überreicht unserem himmlischen Gast unser Geschenk!"
languages.original_text: "Had it been me in your shoes, Your Celestial Highness, I would not have guessed any of them — I dare say I would have... anti-guessed! After all, even a scrubwoman would look like a princess if you dressed her in silks and laces. But you are able to see through any deception! Maive, go on and present our special gift to our celestial guest!"

traits.locale_text: "Wäre ich an Eurer Stelle gewesen, Eure himmlische Hoheit, ich hätte keinen einzigen von ihnen erraten. Beinahe möchte ich sagen, ich hätte ... anti-geraten! Schließlich sähe selbst eine Putzfrau wie eine Prinzessin aus, wenn man sie in Seide und Spitze kleidet. Ihr aber durchschaut jede Täuschung! Maive, überreicht unserem himmlischen Gast unser Geschenk!"
